mapper.sql: a.id, a.name, a.href, a.permission, a.type, a.sort, a.icon, a.parent_id AS "parent.id"
mapper.select: SELECT id, name FROM t_menu WHERE parent_id=-1
SELECT a.id, a.name, b.id AS menu_id, b.name AS menu_name FROM (SELECT * FROM t_menu WHERE parent_id=-1) a LEFT JOIN t_menu b ON a.id=b.parent_id ORDER BY a.sort, b.sort

SELECT , b.name AS "parent.name" FROM t_menu a LEFT JOIN t_menu b ON a.parent_id=b.id
a.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.permission like CONCAT('%',#{permission},'%')
ORDER BY a.id DESC
